attributes.action: Phil Taylor should be honoured for his achievements in sport.
attributes.background: There have been many sports personal who have been rewarded and remembered for there sporting achievements, most recently Andy Murray. However no one has won as many tornaments in any one sport as phil Taylor has, and for him to be as dominant and conisitant over a long period deserves recognition.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
